description.value:
Activate 1 Interact

Journeybread contains a mix of fruits, nuts, and grains with an alchemical boost. Eating one journeybread provides all the food and water you need for a day. If you subsist on nothing else for a week, you become temporarily immune to journeybread until you eat real food and drink water normally for 24 hours.

In addition to the benefits of journeybread, power journeybread grants you a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Climb]{Climb}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Force Open]{Force Open}, and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Swim]{Swim}, and to Fortitude saving throws against being sickened. The number of minutes you can Hustle changes to your Constitution modifier Ã— 20. These benefits last for 4 hours.
